text: update: Its because I was using the same iterator variable in both modules so i guess the wires were getting crossed

Hey fellow HubSpotters :wave: ,
If I want to copy and paste from one module to another the JSON fields. How would I be able to generate a unique ID for each field? For example, I want the same animation options between different modules but instead of building out the fields over and over in the GUI, I'd like to copy and paste it over in the `fields.json`.  Any help is much appreciated!
